_description: Code snippets for WiX localization files (.wxl)

snippets.name: WXL File Template
snippets.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<WixLocalization xmlns="http://wixtoolset.org/schemas/v4/wxl" Culture="${1:en-US}">
  <String Id="${2:ProductName}">${3:My Application}</String>
  $0
</WixLocalization>

snippets.name: Localized String
snippets.body: <String Id="${1:StringId}">${2:Localized text}</String>

snippets.name: Overridable String
snippets.description: Localized string that can be overridden
snippets.body: <String Id="${1:StringId}" Overridable="yes">${2:Default text}</String>

snippets.name: UI Control Localization
snippets.body: <UI Dialog="${1:DialogName}" Control="${2:ControlName}" Text="${3:Localized text}" />

snippets.name: Product Strings
snippets.body:
<String Id="ProductName">${1:My Application}</String>
<String Id="ProductDescription">${2:Application description}</String>
<String Id="Manufacturer">${3:Company Name}</String>
<String Id="ProductVersion">${4:1.0.0}</String>

snippets.name: Button Text Strings
snippets.body:
<String Id="ButtonText_Back">${1:Back}</String>
<String Id="ButtonText_Next">${2:Next}</String>
<String Id="ButtonText_Cancel">${3:Cancel}</String>
<String Id="ButtonText_Install">${4:Install}</String>
<String Id="ButtonText_Finish">${5:Finish}</String>

snippets.name: Welcome Dialog Strings
snippets.body:
<String Id="WelcomeDlgTitle">${1:Welcome to [ProductName] Setup}</String>
<String Id="WelcomeDlgDescription">${2:The Setup Wizard will install [ProductName] on your computer. Click Next to continue or Cancel to exit the Setup Wizard.}</String>

snippets.name: License Dialog Strings
snippets.body:
<String Id="LicenseAgreementDlgTitle">${1:License Agreement}</String>
<String Id="LicenseAgreementDlgDescription">${2:Please read the following license agreement carefully.}</String>
<String Id="LicenseAcceptText">${3:I accept the terms in the License Agreement}</String>

snippets.name: Install Directory Strings
snippets.body:
<String Id="InstallDirDlgTitle">${1:Destination Folder}</String>
<String Id="InstallDirDlgDescription">${2:Click Next to install to the default folder or click Change to choose another.}</String>
<String Id="InstallDirDlgChange">${3:Change...}</String>

snippets.name: Progress Dialog Strings
snippets.body:
<String Id="ProgressDlgTitleInstalling">${1:Installing [ProductName]}</String>
<String Id="ProgressDlgTitleRemoving">${2:Removing [ProductName]}</String>
<String Id="ProgressDlgTitleRepairing">${3:Repairing [ProductName]}</String>
<String Id="ProgressDlgStatusLabel">${4:Status:}</String>

snippets.name: Exit Dialog Strings
snippets.body:
<String Id="ExitDlgTitle">${1:Completed the [ProductName] Setup Wizard}</String>
<String Id="ExitDlgDescription">${2:Click the Finish button to exit the Setup Wizard.}</String>
<String Id="ExitDlgLaunchText">${3:Launch [ProductName]}</String>

snippets.name: Maintenance Dialog Strings
snippets.body:
<String Id="MaintenanceTypeDlgTitle">${1:Change, repair, or remove installation}</String>
<String Id="MaintenanceTypeDlgChangeButton">${2:Change}</String>
<String Id="MaintenanceTypeDlgChangeText">${3:Change which features are installed.}</String>
<String Id="MaintenanceTypeDlgRepairButton">${4:Repair}</String>
<String Id="MaintenanceTypeDlgRepairText">${5:Repair installation errors.}</String>
<String Id="MaintenanceTypeDlgRemoveButton">${6:Remove}</String>
<String Id="MaintenanceTypeDlgRemoveText">${7:Remove [ProductName] from your computer.}</String>

snippets.name: Error Message Strings
snippets.body:
<String Id="Error_AdminRequired">${1:Administrator privileges are required to install this application.}</String>
<String Id="Error_OSVersion">${2:This application requires a newer version of Windows.}</String>
<String Id="Error_AlreadyInstalled">${3:[ProductName] is already installed.}</String>

snippets.name: Feature Description Strings
snippets.body:
<String Id="Feature_${1:FeatureName}_Title">${2:Feature Title}</String>
<String Id="Feature_${1:FeatureName}_Description">${3:Feature description text.}</String>

snippets.name: Action Text Strings
snippets.body:
<String Id="ActionText_Installing">${1:Installing files...}</String>
<String Id="ActionText_Configuring">${2:Configuring components...}</String>
<String Id="ActionText_Registering">${3:Registering product...}</String>
<String Id="ActionText_Removing">${4:Removing files...}</String>
